metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with reference to sales order item
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items with reference to sales order item") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with reference to stock transport order item
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items with reference to stock transport order item") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items without reference
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items without reference") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items manually created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items manually created") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created using transaction VL01N for single processing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items created using transaction VL01N for single processing") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created using transaction VL10x for mass processing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items created using transaction VL10x for mass processing") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items automatically created from sales order
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items automatically created from sales order") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with transfer order item created and not confirmed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items with transfer order item created and not confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with transfer order confirmed with differences
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items with transfer order confirmed with differences") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with transfer order created after planned picking date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items with transfer order created after planned picking date") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items relevant for packing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items relevant for packing") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items where packing has not yet started
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items where packing has not yet started") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with partial packing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items with partial packing") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with packing completed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items with packing completed") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items relevant for transportation planning
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items relevant for transportation planning") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items not yet assigned to any shipment document
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items not yet assigned to any shipment document") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items completely planned for transportation
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items completely planned for transportation") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with goods issue posting later than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items with goods issue posting later than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items incomplete for goods movement
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items incomplete for goods movement") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items overdue for goods movement
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items overdue for goods movement") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with header delivery block
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery items with header delivery block") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with transfer order item created and confirmed (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Delivery items with transfer order item created and confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with transfer order item created and confirmed (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Delivery items with transfer order item created and confirmed")

metrics.name: Delivery items with goods issue posted (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Delivery items with goods issue posted") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items with goods issue posted (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Delivery items with goods issue posted")

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item immediately when saving sales order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item immediately when saving sales order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item via single transaction VL01/VL01N
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item via single transaction VL01/VL01N')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item manually via delivery due transaction VL10x
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item manually via delivery due transaction VL10x')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item automatically
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item automatically')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item via custom transaction
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item via custom transaction')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item via other transactions
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item via other transactions')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Perform transportation planning for outbound delivery
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Perform transportation planning for outbound delivery')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create transfer order item and confirm without difference
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create transfer order item and confirm without difference')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create transfer order item and confirm with difference
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create transfer order item and confirm with difference')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Process outbound delivery with packing
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Process outbound delivery with packing')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods issue
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods issue')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
